about:
Elora's Raid Only Genuine Copyright

Online giving away thousands of draws, Super Hero and limited skin, mobile game to arrange cards


"Elora's Raid: Summoning Destiny" is a mobile card arrangement game with epic mythological themes, a world full of miracles and challenges! The game possesses sophisticated graphics, beautiful skills, rich storyline and diverse gameplay. On your adventure journey, you will be associated with the gods, the Divine Priest with divine wisdom, the Sphinx - the King of the Wind who loves freedom, the brave Na Tra for justice, the godly Zeus of Thunder, and more. Loki is full of conspiracy... You will participate in the war between the gods on the land of "Elora", fight for supremacy, create your own myth!


Unique battle strategy, ignore overpowering stats!
The combination of locations and heroes is rich, freely changing the combination, creating a rich and varied combat experience.
The five major attributes counter each other, taking advantage of the characteristics of the Heroes to combine the squad, this moment you are the god of wisdom!


Spirit Copy, Planetary War, Endless Practice - various types of PVE copies!
Battle Arena, Guild War, Dien Tinh Ha - Fierce PVP Battle!
Diverse gameplay is waiting for you to join, it will not be a boring game experience!


Adventurers from all over gather here, sharing the story of adventure that belongs to you!
Diverse chat channels, passionately exchanging battle tactics with friends without borders.
For players who love to make friends, you can enjoy chatting here!


With just one hand operation, you can experience the unique game content!
Regardless of whether you are working, studying or sleeping, you can hang the resource gathering machine, helping you to level up easily.
If the battle strength is high, the copy will automatically cross the border, no need to fight directly.

name: Cookies Must Die
about:
üèÜWinner of the 2020 GOOGLE INDIE GAMES FESTIVAL! üèÜ
Play a new game from the creators of Dragon Hills and Daddy Was A Thief!

Jack is a super-secret agent with special powers implanted in his body by government scientists! He has to stop a group of evil, mutated cookies and their powerful bosses before they reduce his city to rubble!

Hurry! Grab the best weapon and sling onto the battlefield! Start an intense and exciting war. Crush your enemies, survive the attacks, defeat huge bosses with your smart movements and skills.
Deadly jellies, angry cookies, threatening chocolates and many more sweet but dangerous characters are waiting here!



‚óè A fast-paced, platform-based shooter game of epic action
‚óè Easy-to-play but hard-to-master gameplay (just swipe to jump or run)
‚óè The slow-motion effect to shoot with extreme precision and feel like you‚Äôre in the Matrix.
‚óè Epic boss battles
‚óè Upgradeable weapons, characters and explosive power-ups available for unlocking
‚óè Achievements and leaderboards to compete with friends
‚óè An incredibly addictive game with tons of surprising moments.



=================================
Rebel Twins, is the developer behind great games like: Daddy Was A Thief, Dragon Hills, Dragon Hills 2, Aliens Drive Me Crazy, Crumble Zone.
=================================


To start the game you must accept our:
Privacy Policy: http://www.rebeltwins.com/privacy-policy/

PLEASE NOTE!
Our games are free to download and play. However, it is possible to buy game currency or some game items using real money. You can disable in-app purchases from your device's settings if you do not want to use this feature.

name: Soul Slayer Idle
about:
One day in the midst of ordinary days...
You are summoned to another world and embark on an adventure to become the greatest hunter, protecting peace from evil.
Raise a powerful Shadow Legion and grow your own hunter.


- High-quality graphics based on full 3D
- Spectacular battle system with hit satisfaction
- Create your own unique character by combining various costume pieces
- Shadow legion system with 36 different types of skills
- Dungeons with various rules to get growth materials
- Rest reward system where you can get various items even in offline mode

name: Reverse: 1999
about:
Reverse: 1999 is a 20th Century Time-Travel Strategic RPG developed by Bluepoch.

On the last day of 1999, the "Storm" fell upon the world. You witnessed an era reversed beneath the rising raindrops. Defying all reasons, what unfolds in front of you is the world of an era long past.

As the Timekeeper, observer of eras, you are free to travel through these eras after each "Storm." With the aid of Sonetto, a powerful Arcanist and ally from the Foundation, your mission is to travel through eras to where the "Storm" is most active, find other Arcanists who can sense the coming "Storm," and save them from being "sifted out" of the timeline.

‚ñ∂‚ñ∂Stunning Visuals Blending Retro and Modern Aesthetics‚óÄ‚óÄ
Step into the mysterious alt-history animated by unique visual elements that blend Pop Art, classical oil painting, and more art styles in history.

‚ñ∂‚ñ∂A Cinematic Adventure across the 20th Century‚óÄ‚óÄ
From the Roaring '20s to the turn of the millennium, you will embark on a journey across time and space, and uncover the truth about the "Storm" and the mystery of the year 1999.

‚ñ∂‚ñ∂Full English Voice Acting with Authentic Accents‚óÄ‚óÄ
Immerse yourself in ages past. Enjoy a story performed by diverse cast of voice actors with British, Italian, French, and other accents.

‚ñ∂‚ñ∂Fantastic Arcanists from Different Times and Regions‚óÄ‚óÄ
People once called them "mages," "wizards," and "freaks." Now they live in uneasy coexistence with regular humans ‚Ä¶ But who are the Arcanists, really?

‚ñ∂‚ñ∂Weave Arcane Incantations to Attain Glorious Victories‚óÄ‚óÄ
Build your team, cast spells, and use gorgeous arcane skills to defeat your enemies. Begin your exciting adventure through time in this all-new RPG.

Official Website: https://re1999.bluepoch.com/en/home
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/reverse1999global
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Reverse1999_GL
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@Reverse1999
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/reverse1999
